manifest:
builder:
  track: dev

labels:
  app: estafette-ci-web
  team: estafette-team
  language: node

version:
  semver:
    major: 0
    minor: 0
    patch: '{{auto}}'
    labelTemplate: '{{branch}}'
    releaseBranch: master

env:
  GCR_PROJECT: estafette.secret(3tHZ9bT_wEz5K8Cx.kZyD5m8L-7-zpvzZ4bkeyUdKLiGfRx_ttoY=)

stages:
  restore:
    image: node:10.4.0-alpine
    commands:
    - npm install

  unit-test:
    image: node:10.4.0-alpine
    commands:
    - npm run unit

  build:
    image: node:10.4.0-alpine
    commands:
    - npm run build

  bake:
    image: docker:18.03.1-ce
    commands:
    - mkdir publish
    - cp -r dist publish
    - cp nginx.vh.default.conf ./publish
    - cp Dockerfile ./publish
    - docker build -f ./publish/Dockerfile -t estafette/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION} ./publish

  push-to-docker-hub:
    image: docker:18.03.1-ce
    env:
      DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME: estafette.secret(mhN5HP5qcUkpSp4m.s9UnvG027LhQjT-bvvyjYcLKtyd_-xY1Cw==)
      DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD: estafette.secret(_oi7CDX50U8qjQSS.U3dzq3cw3J-_-hODYbNtOEDWgeUGzgXk2J0T-WMOmkil56tg)
    commands:
    - docker login --username=${DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME} --password="${DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD}"
    - docker push estafette/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
    when:
      status == 'succeeded' &&
      branch == 'master' &&
      server == 'gocd'

  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    webhook: estafette.secret(VQhyeydGURZSFLmh.zxAW1ZVhI7JqLgr9-K7_YuzSFWAasNFRIHAm9OXj2RK_Wa-FWXt9LCCJuD6K6jz_SYpbEhiBWcjd0VkD23AazyLmz3EsImi2C1AJ82ltxuMmN93rPZbdP3kT5vwa)
    name: ${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    when:
      status == 'failed'
manifestWithDefaults:
builder:
  track: dev

labels:
  app: estafette-ci-web
  team: estafette-team
  language: node

version:
  semver:
    major: 0
    minor: 0
    patch: '{{auto}}'
    labelTemplate: '{{branch}}'
    releaseBranch: master

env:
  GCR_PROJECT: estafette.secret(3tHZ9bT_wEz5K8Cx.kZyD5m8L-7-zpvzZ4bkeyUdKLiGfRx_ttoY=)

stages:
  restore:
    image: node:10.4.0-alpine
    shell: /bin/sh
    commands:
    - npm install

  unit-test:
    image: node:10.4.0-alpine
    shell: /bin/sh
    commands:
    - npm run unit

  build:
    image: node:10.4.0-alpine
    shell: /bin/sh
    commands:
    - npm run build

  bake:
    image: docker:18.03.1-ce
    shell: /bin/sh
    commands:
    - mkdir publish
    - cp -r dist publish
    - cp nginx.vh.default.conf ./publish
    - cp Dockerfile ./publish
    - docker build -f ./publish/Dockerfile -t estafette/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION} ./publish

  push-to-docker-hub:
    image: docker:18.03.1-ce
    env:
      DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME: estafette.secret(mhN5HP5qcUkpSp4m.s9UnvG027LhQjT-bvvyjYcLKtyd_-xY1Cw==)
      DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD: estafette.secret(_oi7CDX50U8qjQSS.U3dzq3cw3J-_-hODYbNtOEDWgeUGzgXk2J0T-WMOmkil56tg)
    shell: /bin/sh
    commands:
    - docker login --username=${DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME} --password="${DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD}"
    - docker push estafette/${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}:${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
    when:
      status == 'succeeded' &&
      branch == 'master' &&
      server == 'gocd'

  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    webhook: estafette.secret(VQhyeydGURZSFLmh.zxAW1ZVhI7JqLgr9-K7_YuzSFWAasNFRIHAm9OXj2RK_Wa-FWXt9LCCJuD6K6jz_SYpbEhiBWcjd0VkD23AazyLmz3EsImi2C1AJ82ltxuMmN93rPZbdP3kT5vwa)
    name: ${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP}
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    when:
      status == 'failed'

commits.message: this is a superlong commit message that needs to be truncated in order not to ruin the layout
